definition: abbr. for 論語|论语[Lun2 yu3], The Analects (of Confucius)
opinion/view/theory/doctrine/to discuss/to talk about/to regard/to consider/per/by the (kilometer, hour etc)

sentences.english: The advantages of iron ore-coal pellets covered with iron-concentrate shell are discussed.
sentences.chinese: 论述了矿煤球团用铁精矿及添加剂包壳的优点。

sentences.english: This paper talks about related problems with campus culture construction in higher institutes .
sentences.chinese: 本文对高校校园文化建设的相关问题加以论述。

sentences.english: R. C. – Of discourse, of the body, that is what I mean.
sentences.chinese: 关于论述，关于身体，那是我的意思。

sentences.english: This paper describes the basic principles of the image digitizer and its development course.
sentences.chinese: 本文论述了图像数字化器的基本原理及其发展过程。
这是他又一非常关键的论述。

sentences.english: Lastly, it discusses the layout of the warehouse and optimization of the goods location.
sentences.chinese: 最后，论述了仓库的布局和货位优化问题。

sentences.english: This paper discusses the relationship between the truth perfect, beautiful life principle and university education.
sentences.chinese: 论述了求真求善求美的人生理念与大学教育的关系。

sentences.english: The part of 3th discusses the role of the theory of comparative advantage for Chinese foreign trade .
sentences.chinese: 第三部分论述了比较优势理论对中国对外贸易的作用。

sentences.english: Meanwhile, some mechanisms of defoaming in refine sugar were related here.
sentences.chinese: 并对制糖业中的消泡机理进行了论述。

sentences.english: This paper studies on the relationship between the Ma Wusu sands control and particle board′s building.
sentences.chinese: 本文论述了毛乌素沙地治理与刨花板厂建设的关系。

sentences.english: The methods for measuring the geometry dimension of graphite electrode tapered nipples as well as the measurement mechanism adopted are reviewed.
sentences.chinese: 论述了测量石墨电极接头的各种方法及测量原理。

sentences.english: It can be called as the exposition of surrounding rock reinforcement.
sentences.chinese: 此论述也可称围岩加固论。

sentences.english: In chapter two, the background of the Notes of Classical Chinese is demonstrated.
sentences.chinese: 第二章论述了《古文观止》成书的背景。

sentences.english: Furthermore, the suitable control methods of VRM are discussed.
sentences.chinese: 同时对适用于VRM的控制方法进行了论述。

sentences.english: In chapter 4, the experiment of temperature-thermal Errors of CNC machine tools is introduced.
sentences.chinese: 第四章，主要论述了数控机床热误差实验。

sentences.english: The second chapter mainly discusses Dingli's commercial literary view.
sentences.chinese: 第二部分主要论述了丁力的商情文学观。

definition: to expound (a position)/to elaborate (on a topic)/to treat (a subject)
to elucidate/to expound/to study and explain
to prove a point/to expound on/to demonstrate or prove (through argument)/proof
(often used in book or chapter titles) general introduction/overview
same as 總而言之|总而言之[zong3 er2 yan2 zhi1]
epistemology (in philosophy, the theory of how we know things)
